title: Why U.S.-China Trade Talks Are Fueling Optimism This Time
text:
The first face-to-face talks between U.S. and Chinese trade envoys got under way in Washington on Thursday after a week of developments that complicated the fractious relationship between the two economies. There are indications that some progress could emerge from this week’s meetings with a partial deal that includes possibly delaying the next increase in tariffs.

The S&P 500 is up 0.91%, at 2946, in midday trading, while the iShares MSCI China exchange-traded fund (ticker: MCHI) is up 1.6%, at $57.04.

...
description: Some progress could emerge from this week’s meetings with a partial deal that includes possibly delaying the next increase in tariffs. But there are no guarantees.
